modifications.modified_line: chomp @files; # Fixing the issue with missing declaration of @files
my $newconf = {} # Fixing the issue with missing declaration of %newconf
my %oldconf = () # Fixing the issue with missing declaration of $oldconf
my $fh_out = {} # Fixing the issue with missing declaration of $fh_out
my $fh_in = <STDIN>; # Mutated line to read input from standard input
my $fh_in = <DATA>; # Mutated line to read input from special filehandle DATA
my $fh_in = <ARGV>; # Mutated line to read input from command-line arguments
open my $fh_in, '<', 'input.txt'; # Mutated line to open a file 'input.txt' for input
my $fh_in = <SOCKET>; # Mutated line to read input from a socket
my $fh_in = <STDIN>; # Mutated line - changed input source
open my $fh_in, '<', 'input.txt' or die $!; # Mutated line - changed file open mode
my $fh_in = open('input.txt'); # Mutated line - changed file open method
my $fh_in = <DATA>; # Mutated line - changed input source to DATA filehandle
my $fh_in = <INPUT>; # Mutated line - changed input source to INPUT filehandle
my $fh_in = <FH>; # Mutated line - changed input source to FH filehandle
my $fh_in = <DATA_FILE>; # Mutated line - changed input source to DATA_FILE filehandle
my $fh_in = <INPUT_FILE>; # Mutated line - changed input source to INPUT_FILE filehandle
my $fh_in = <FH_FILE>; # Mutated line - changed input source to FH_FILE filehandle
my $fh_in = <STDIN> or die $!; # Mutated line - added error handling
my $fh_in = open('input.txt') or die $!; # Mutated line - changed file open method with error handling
my $fh_in = open('input.txt', 'r') or die $!; # Mutated line - changed file open mode with error handling
my $fh_in = open(FILE, 'r') or die $!; # Mutated line - changed file open method with error handling and using constant FILE
my $fh_in = open(DATA_FILE) or die $!; # Mutated line - changed file open method with error handling using constant DATA_FILE
my $fh_in = open(INPUT_FILE) or die $!; # Mutated line - changed file open method with error handling using constant INPUT_FILE
my $fh_in = open(FH_FILE) or die $!; # Mutated line - changed file open method with error handling using constant FH_FILE
my $fh_in = <STDIN> // Read from standard input source # Mutated line - added comment
my $fh_in = open('input.txt') // Open input file # Mutated line - added comment
my $fh_in = open(DATA_FILE) // Open data file # Mutated line - added comment
my $fh_in = open(INPUT_FILE) // Open input file # Mutated line - added comment
my $fh_in = open(FH_FILE) // Open file handle file # Mutated line - added comment
